title: Scary Stories 11: JEEPERS!
description:
Oscar Sagastume, Jill Heinerth, Natalie Nicole Dressel, Cyndi Freeman, and Elise delMas share scary stories in our annual Halloween special.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Oscar Sagastume, Natalie Nicole Dressel, On An On, Kris Anderson, Elise delMas, Donovan, Cyndi Freeman, Jeff Barr, Kevin Allison, Jill Heinerth, Robert Fullum)
